ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9

Class MarsWeather

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9.MarsWeather

  • public class MarsWeather
extends java.lang.Object
    The class retrieves mars weather condition for the as a JSON string. The JSON string is parsed and stored into a container class. Each individual JSON component have data member associated within the nested class container.
    Author:
    Amha Tsegaye 2212 2015 Team9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarsWeather()
      The default constructor for mars Weather class access the API put the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarsWeather

        public MarsWeather()
        The default constructor for mars Weather class access the API put the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member. If the URL can not be reached it result in IOException. If successfully retrieves the JSON value it calls the helper class fillDataWeatherData method to update the data members in the DataWeatherData container.

    • Method Detail

      • fillDataWeatherData

        public void fillDataWeatherData()
        A private helper method to load the JSON data from the website into the the nested class container. Each data is parsed from the JSON string file and stored in specific data member within the class container.
